levels.levelDescription: Traverse through the dark-grass meadows where the shadows deepen, concealing treacherous deep-dark holes waiting to swallow the unwary traveler.
Journey across decaying rusty-chain platforms amidst the ruins, with ominous waters blocking your path, whispering drowned secrets of the past.
Ascend the fiery fractured-wall platforms to the imposing Spectral Citadel, where rivers of lava flow, heralding the legendary Ethereal Spirit Warrior, the Spectralblade.
